title: Final Recap: The Wind in the Willows [Spoiler Alert]
description:
Tonight, Elizabeth recaps the final episode of The Wind in the Willows by Kenneth Grahame, originally published in 1908.


Try The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepybookshelf.supercast.com/.
